Enjoy the movie... Comment n provide feedback... http://thepiratebay.org/user/prashant22/ and http://1337x.org/user/GokU61/ and on my ahashare account
welcome guys...only u 2 people say thanks for almost every release of mine...thanks for that...

@DSIN
correct...it takes almost a day to download a movie.. sometimes 2 days also...
nd abt 12-18 hrs to encode depending on lenght of movie...
n 1-2 hr time goes in making sample, updating the description, uploading screen shots n then uploading the torrent...

all people hv do is just say thanks or comment on quality if they like it...or can just give a +1...
bt no one does that expect for few....

as a uploader i just wait for comments..u really want to know that people like ur work...
some people dont even say thanks if their requests r done..like some 'st1998' requested robin hood men in tights..'fuckerr' requested daredevil...these guys didnt even cared to say thanks even for their requests....it really hurts...

bt u n some people like u keeps me going...
thanks a grip man. you have tons of movies i havent seen in forever that i used to look for. thanks a ton

Thanks alot for the upload! I saw the comments about how long it actually takes to encode and everything, and i realized that i never thank people. Although i did'nt have an account here and did'nt need one. But i made one so i can start thanking! hehe peace
Thanks man i love this movie!
Thanks for the UL. Havent seen this one in ages.

This movie contain quite a few scenes in the dark...And in those scenes, the quality seems a slight bit "stretched out", but overall?...Nice quality & good size...Essentially, DVD quality or very close to it....V/M=8/8....Thanx the ever reliable prashant22.... 8)
